description:
Hello internet friend! This is a quick, fun, highly-effective course that shares powerful techniques that can transform your guitar playing. You'll stop being a frustrated beginner and become someone who can create MUSIC!

NOTE: This is not a complete 'learn guitar from scratch' course. This is a simple course to share 7 powerful techniques with you. That's all. Please don't give me a poor review because you didn't learn EVERYTHING about guitar in this quick, free, course!! :-)

This course is short & sweet but it's PACKED with value. You'll learn the absolute best tips to quickly boost your musicality. No fluff and no waffle. This is a concise course that values your time and tell you what you need to know with the minimum amount of fuss.

Let's get started! The course consists of seven HD video lessons from Mike Kennedy, the founder of the National Guitar Academy (www.nationalguitaracademy.com).
title: 7 Ways A Beginner Guitarist Can Sound Better, Instantly!
